meanings.sent1: It was unwise to walk alone in the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: It is unwise to spend all your money in one day.
meanings.sent3: The unwise decision to skip breakfast made him regret it later.
meanings.sent4: Her unwise choice of words led to a heated argument.
meanings.sent5: Being unwise with fire can lead to dangerous consequences.

meanings.sent1: It was unwise to ignore the warning signs.
meanings.sent2: She made an unwise investment that resulted in losses.
meanings.sent3: His unwise attempt to fix the leaky faucet only made it worse.
meanings.sent4: Choosing to drive without a seatbelt is unwise.
meanings.sent5: Eating expired food is unwise and can make you sick.
